question.title: Products With Three or More Orders in Two Consecutive Years
question.translatedTitle: 连续两年有 3 个及以上订单的产品
question.metaData: {"mysql":["Create table If Not Exists Orders (order_id int, product_id int, quantity int, purchase_date date)"],"mssql":["Create table Orders (order_id int, product_id int, quantity int, purchase_date date)"],"oraclesql":["Create table Orders (order_id int, product_id int, quantity int, purchase_date date)","ALTER SESSION SET nls_date_format='YYYY-MM-DD'"],"database":true,"name":"find_valid_products","pythondata":["Orders = pd.DataFrame([], columns=['order_id', 'product_id', 'quantity', 'purchase_date']).astype({'order_id':'Int64', 'product_id':'Int64', 'quantity':'Int64', 'purchase_date':'datetime64[ns]'})"],"postgresql":["Create table If Not Exists Orders (order_id int, product_id int, quantity int, purchase_date date)"],"database_schema":{"Orders":{"order_id":"INT","product_id":"INT","quantity":"INT","purchase_date":"DATE"}}}
